attributes.action: either stop the undemocratic ratification of the Treaty of Lisbon after it has been rejected by Ireland, or give the British people a referendum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British people have a democratic right to say whether they wish their fundamental rights handed to unelected and unaccountable EU officials.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
